name: Two Wars - Part 1
description: A band of survivors must cope with both an alien invasion, lack of resources and themselves
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 upwards Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
